name: WAR: Playing Both Sides
description:
The Azure Alliance and Rouge Republic are at war again, vying for control of the Plainlands.  Fortunately, you've won the contracts to supply both sides with arms! As long as each has towers standing you'll keep raking in the gold (1g per soldier, and 150g per tower rebuilt).

To that end you've hired a less-than-scrupulous wizard to undermine their efforts. Use the Wizard's orb (space) to view the future.  Bad Intel (left-click) can redirect an army to another tower or conflict (left-click again), and Berserk (right-click) can mutate and enhance a unit to wonderous effect!  

However, wizards don't come free, so try not to go crazy....
